Forums

{{ forum.Name }}

  • Hi
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { IForum } from './forum'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { ForumService } from './forum.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-forums', templateUrl: './forum.component.html', styleUrls: ['./forum.component.css'] }) export class ForumComponent implements OnInit { forums: IForum[] = []; constructor( private _router: Router, private _forumService: ForumService) { } getForums(): void { console.log("Forum Component: getForums()") this._forumService.getForums().subscribe((data: IForum[]) => { console.log("Data Received: " + JSON.stringify(data)); this.forums = data; }, (error) => { console.error("Error fetching data for forums: " + error); }); } ngOnInit(): void { console.log("Forum Component: ngOnInit()") this.getForums(); } }
